video.title: A Different World
video.synopsis: This spinoff of "The Cosby Show" follows Denise Huxtable to historically black Hillman College, where she befriends an eclectic group of students.

episodes.synopsis: As Denise begins her school year at Hillman, she meets her new roommate -- a 26 year-old divorcee who makes her feel uncomfortable.
episodes.title: Reconcilable Differences

episodes.synopsis: Denise is all set for college -- until she finds out that her dorm payment check bounced and that her checking account is overdrawn.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Jalessa and Whitley run against each other for dorm monitor; Denise leaves a pizza in the lounge and has to wear a pig nose as punishment.
episodes.title: Porky de Bergerac

episodes.synopsis: When Denise gets a poor grade in calculus, she turns to Dwayne for help. He tutors her late into the night and gets trapped in the female dormitory.
episodes.title: Those Who Can't… Tutor

episodes.synopsis: Maggie and Whitley plan a debate on how women should balance a career and family life; Dwayne pursues a campus disc jockey job.
episodes.title: War of the Words

episodes.synopsis: Denise's little sister Rudy comes to Hillman for a visit, but instead of bonding with Denise, she makes Whitley her new role model.
episodes.title: Rudy and the Snow Queen

episodes.synopsis: Russell Huxtable pays his granddaughter Denise a visit, which puts a damper on her plans to pull a prank with her friends.
episodes.title: Sometimes You Get the Bear, Sometimes the Bear Gets You

episodes.synopsis: Denise's dad is proud when she tries out for the track team, but she cannot handle the practices; Maggie needs to find a book for her term paper.
episodes.title: If Chosen, I May Not Run

episodes.synopsis: Denise has a handsome new geology professor and mistakes his interest in her as romantic; Maggie decides that Americans need too much personal space.
episodes.title: Romancing Mr. Stone

episodes.synopsis: Whitley's father introduces her to his new younger girlfriend; Dwayne tries to win Denise by having Ron be her servant for the week.
episodes.title: The Gift of the Magi

episodes.synopsis: Denise tries to warn Dwayne when she realizes that he has been asked out on a date that is actually a set-up, and Jalessa is wagering on the results.
episodes.title: Does He or Doesn't He?

episodes.synopsis: Denise volunteers for peer counseling and, due to complaints that appearances are neglected during finals week, a "Miss Ugly America" pageant is held.
episodes.title: Advise and Descent

episodes.synopsis: Jalessa fills in as resident director after Stevie leaves to get married, but when a replacement is found, Jaleesa resists relinquishing the job.
episodes.title: The Prime of Miss Lettie Bostic

episodes.synopsis: Denise befriends a new student and tries to help her out with a place to sleep, but she is caught by Lettie before the night is out.
episodes.title: Wild Child

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne re-invents himself as a dream man to get a Valentine's Day date; Lettie is surprised when an old flame pays her a visit.
episodes.title: Dr. Cupid

episodes.synopsis: Denise and Whitley earn roles in Maggie's play and vie for the affections of the leading man; Dwayne and Ron try to design sets on a miniscule budget.
episodes.title: The Show Must Go On

episodes.synopsis: Whitney thinks she has the Miss Hillman pageant sewn up, but then, much to her chagrin, Denise signs Dwayne up to be a contestant.
episodes.title: Mr. Hillman

episodes.synopsis: Maggie obsesses over money she lent to Denise that she has not paid back; Jalessa struggles with stage fright before a recitation in speech class.
episodes.title: Speech Therapy

episodes.synopsis: Clair tells Denise that she will have to get a summer job instead of going to Greece; Whitley sulks when she thinks no one remembered her birthday.
episodes.title: Clair's Last Stand

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne finally convinces Denise to go out with him, but the evening does not go as planned; Whitley pins her hopes on winning a summer internship.
episodes.title: If Only for One Night

episodes.synopsis: When Maggie and Dwayne care for eggs as a part of a project, Maggie recruits Jalessa to "eggsit" so that she can attend her volleyball game.
episodes.title: Come Back, Little Eggby

episodes.synopsis: When Denise needs support, she invites her brother Theo to spend the weekend, but he spends more time with his new Hillman friends than with her.
episodes.title: My Dinner With Theo

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne takes calculus, where he meets Dr. War, Hillman's notoriously tough math professor. Meanwhile, Whitley can't stand her new roommate.
episodes.title: Dr. War Is Hell

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne regrets partnering with Ron on a philosophy term paper. Meanwhile, Kim and Freddie look for campus jobs.
episodes.title: Two Gentlemen of Hillman

episodes.synopsis: Jaleesa agrees to go to dinner with Walter, but insists she just wants to be friends. Meanwhile, Dwayne and Ron launch a wake-up service.
episodes.title: Some Enchanted Late Afternoon

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne and Whitley don't want to admit their sudden attraction to one another. Meanwhile, Freddie becomes Dwayne's secret admirer.
episodes.title: Dream Lover

episodes.synopsis: Whitley and Jaleesa hope that befriending an aspiring opera singer will help them win a competition to sing backup for guest star Gladys Knight.
episodes.title: Three Girls Three

episodes.synopsis: Whitley and Kim stay at Hillman over Thanksgiving but choose dancing over a big dinner. Walter, Dwayne and Freddie drive Jalessa home for the holiday.
episodes.title: If You Like Pilgrim Coladas

episodes.synopsis: Whitley's bossiness drives potential dancers away as she choreographs an upcoming step competition. Meanwhile, Dwayne tutors a failing football star.
episodes.title: A Stepping Stone

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne reconsiders his relationship with Suzanne when he learns that Col. Taylor is her father. Freddie asks Whitley for help in winning over Dwayne.
episodes.title: Life with Father

episodes.synopsis: Kim and her new boyfriend take advantage of Whitley's kindness. Meanwhile, Freddie edits a poetry magazine.
episodes.title: All's Fair

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne's radio show is canceled when he spins a new rap album without checking the lyrics first; Whitley gets stuck in the ensuing student protest.
episodes.title: Radio Free Hillman

episodes.synopsis: Kim refuses to see Robert when she believes she's pregnant with his child, so he seeks Dwayne's help in sneaking into the dorm to talk with her.
episodes.title: It Happened One Night

episodes.synopsis: Freddie gets drunk at Dwayne and Ron's party and can't finish a creative writing assignment. Mr. Gaines and Lettie teach Walter to cook for a date.
episodes.title: I've Got the Muse in Me

episodes.synopsis: Clair Huxtable returns to Hillman to give a seminar and brings along her daughter Vanessa, hoping she'll want to go to school there.
episodes.title: Risky Business

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne asks Whitley for advice when Suzanne turns down his marriage proposal. Meanwhile, Jalessa's practical joke on Walter backfires.
episodes.title: Breaking Up Is Hard to Do

episodes.synopsis: Whitley wants to stay at Hillman, but her mother wants her to quit and find a husband. Meanwhile, Freddie starts a campus recycling program.
episodes.title: For She's Only a Bird in a Gilded Cage

episodes.synopsis: When Dwayne and Ron try to join a fraternity, they respond differently to the idea of the pledging process.
episodes.title: It's Greek to Me

episodes.synopsis: Walter, already rankled by the arrival of Jaleesa's ex-husband Lamar, becomes jealous when the two go out to dinner together.
episodes.title: The Thing About Women

episodes.synopsis: Kim's crazy schedule makes it tough to maintain her grades, and Velma kicks Mr. Gaines out of the house when their son Darnell returns home.
episodes.title: High Anxiety

episodes.synopsis: Whitley does major damage to Mr. Gaines's car and takes a job at the Pit to pay for it. Meanwhile, a classmate gives Ron a bad haircut.
episodes.title: Take This Job and Love It

episodes.synopsis: Freddie plans a date with star baseball player Garth, ignoring Dwayne's warnings about the jock's shady history with women.
episodes.title: No Means No

episodes.synopsis: When Dwyane runs for student council president, he gets a boost of encouragement from Rev. Jesse Jackson. Meanwhile, Freddie turns 18.
episodes.title: Citizen Wayne

episodes.synopsis: As the school year ends, Dwayne and Ron move into a run-down apartment, Whitley weighs work and fun, and Walter and Jaleesa agree to take a break.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home

episodes.synopsis: When Whitley and Dwayne board the same plane back to Hillman after summer vacation, she's impressed by his fancy new clothes and makes a play for him.
episodes.title: Strangers on a Plane

episodes.synopsis: Whitley must try to overcome her fear of math so she can fulfill the requirement to graduate. Dwayne and Ron argue about each other's spending habits.
episodes.title: The Heat Is On

episodes.synopsis: Walter is enjoying his position of power as co-ed dorm director, but his new visitation double standard for male residents ruffles Jaleesa's feathers.
episodes.title: The Hat Makes the Man

episodes.synopsis: Whitley volunteers to teach ballet at the community center and befriends one of the kids, but is dismayed when she discovers the boy stole her wallet.
episodes.title: To Have and Have Not

episodes.synopsis: While Whitley struggles with her negative feelings about her father's impending wedding, Dwayne plans to visit Denise to tell her that he loves her.
episodes.title: Forever Hold Your Peace

episodes.synopsis: Ron falls for a student who turns out to have a child. Meanwhile, Dwayne and Whitley disagree on what kind of musical performer to hire for a benefit.
episodes.title: Delusions of Daddyhood

episodes.synopsis: Walter wins a Hawaiian honeymoon and asks Jaleesa to marry him -- but are they moving too fast? Dwayne tries to tell Whitley how he feels about her.
episodes.title: Wedding Bells from Hell

episodes.synopsis: Kim's father forbids her to attend a rap concert, but she goes anyway. And things get awkward when Dwayne and Ron bring dates home on the same night.
episodes.title: Great Expectations

episodes.synopsis: Despite looming exams, Whitley, Dwayne and Freddie drop everything to give Kim moral support when she learns her policeman father has been injured.
episodes.title: Answered Prayers

episodes.synopsis: It's the holiday season, but Whitley is not in a festive mood. Can a visit from the three ghosts of Christmas change her attitude?
episodes.title: For Whom the Jingle Bell Tolls

episodes.synopsis: When Dean Hughes asks Whitley and Freddie to co-host the freshman tea, Whitley tries too hard to impress, while Freddie feels out of her element.
episodes.title: Under One Roof

episodes.synopsis: An old pal of Dwayne's tries to persuade him to leave Hillman and dump his friends. Col. Taylor tries to rekindle an old flame at an Army reunion.
episodes.title: Here's to Old Friends

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne writes a poem about his greatest passion -- math -- but Whitley thinks it's about her. Freddie feels guilty about seeing two different guys.
episodes.title: The Power of the Pen

episodes.synopsis: Whitley experiences prejudice firsthand from a snooty salesperson in a jewelry store. Walter, Dwayne and Ron attend ROTC training with Col. Taylor.
episodes.title: Pride and Prejudice

episodes.synopsis: When Clair Huxtable visits Hillman to help students prep for job interviews, Freddie's archaeology dig enlightens her about different career paths.
episodes.title: Success, Lies and Videotape

episodes.synopsis: Whitley plans to join transfer student Julian in a protest against apartheid, unaware the company they're boycotting has offered Kim a scholarship.
episodes.title: A World Alike

episodes.synopsis: Whitley tells Dwayne she just wants to be friends and offers to set him up. Jaleesa bets Walter that she can teach Freddie to play poker and beat him.
episodes.title: That's the Trouble with You All

episodes.synopsis: Walter and Dwayne give Gilbert Hall residents a dramatized account of their basketball-recruiting trip, complete with fights, arrests and jail time.
episodes.title: A Campfire Story

episodes.synopsis: As graduation quickly approaches, Whitley becomes frustrated with the lack of job offers and decides it's time to rethink her education plans.
episodes.title: Hillman Isn't Through with You Yet

episodes.synopsis: Whitley has envisioned an extravagant celebration for her 21st birthday, but when everyone seems to have forgotten, she feels lonely and neglected.
episodes.title: 21 Candles

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne and Ron are cast in a commercial as basketball players facing off against Hall of Famers. And the gang tries to help Kim with school expenses.
episodes.title: Sweet Charity

episodes.synopsis: While the Hillman students prepare for an ROTC banquet honoring Col. Taylor, Ron obsesses over who might be chosen as Cadet of the Year.
episodes.title: Soldier Boy

episodes.synopsis: The Hillman gang heads to the beach for spring break, but what they'd hoped would be a quiet, relaxing getaway turns into a chaotic nightmare.
episodes.title: Getaway: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With the Hillman gang on the run from drug dealers during their spring break, Ron and Dwayne disguise themselves until they can alert the police.
episodes.title: Getaway: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne gets inducted in Phi Beta Kappa, prompting a visit from his proud mama. Whitley is disappointed when Julian doesn't pop the question.
episodes.title: Perhaps Love

episodes.synopsis: Whitley's determined to start a relationship with Dwayne, only to find he's met someone else. Col. Taylor's son arrives on campus and goes girl-crazy.
episodes.title: Everything Must Change

episodes.synopsis: Whitley accepts a date with Ron to make Dwayne jealous, while Ron hopes to change her feelings. The students vie for coveted spots in a history class.
episodes.title: How Bittersweet It Is

episodes.synopsis: After learning how hard it is for African-American foster children to get adopted, Freddie is on a mission to find a home for one in particular.
episodes.title: Blues for Nobody's Child

episodes.synopsis: Whitley must rein in her spending when her father cuts up her credit cards. Kim focuses so intently on med school exams that she has no social life.
episodes.title: Whitley's Last Supper

episodes.synopsis: The tension between Whitley and Kinu hits an all-time high as the girls and Dwayne prep for an academic competition and Dwayne helps Whitley study.
episodes.title: The Goodwill Games

episodes.synopsis: As everyone's getting stressed out about midterm exams, Walter narrates three "Twilight Zone"-style tales involving Dwayne, Whitley and Freddie.
episodes.title: Tales from the Exam Zone

episodes.synopsis: Whitley offers to clean the apartment shared by Dwayne and his girlfriend, Kinu -- but of course, she has an ulterior motive.
episodes.title: Good Help Is Hard to Fire

episodes.synopsis: Ron has a poor opinion of the homeless until he meets an old friend. Now that Dwayne and Kinu have broken up, Whitley hopes this is her big chance.
episodes.title: Love Thy Neighbor

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne and Whitley have a hard time balancing a relationship and their studies. Freddie and Ron are in charge of the 1990 Hillman time capsule.
episodes.title: Time Keeps on Slippin'

episodes.synopsis: Ron dreams of being a musician rather than working in car sales with his father. Col. Taylor considers joining a previously segregated country club.
episodes.title: The Apple Doesn't Fall

episodes.synopsis: Whitley visits Dwayne's family for Christmas and tries desperately to impress his mother, but her efforts are foiled by a crook posing as Santa.
episodes.title: I'm Dreaming of a Wayne Christmas

episodes.synopsis: When Dwayne's friend visits and announces his Army reserve unit is headed to the Persian Gulf, the gang reacts to the news in different ways.
episodes.title: War and Peace

episodes.synopsis: When Whitley's ex-boyfriend tells her he's engaged -- to a girl who's not too different from Whitley -- she has a hard time absorbing the news.
episodes.title: Ex-Communication

episodes.synopsis: Short on her rent, Whitley tries to make some extra cash, even throwing a fundraising party with Ron's help. Terrence decides to convert to Islam.
episodes.title: Risk Around the Dollar

episodes.synopsis: While Ron juggles three dates for Valentine's day, Dwayne is offended that Whitley didn't include him in the "Men of Hillman" calendar she organized.
episodes.title: Love, Hillman-Style

episodes.synopsis: Kim fears that Matthew's dedication to his drama studies makes them incompatible, but Matthew, as well as Dwayne and Whitley, may prove her wrong.
episodes.title: A Word in Edgewise

episodes.synopsis: Hillman undergraduate Shazza Zulu publishes a book about the alleged shortcomings of black men that has the campus divided along gender lines.
episodes.title: Ms. Understanding

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne faces a tough choice: accept a job offer or attend graduate school. Jaleesa's sister visits and is inspired by Jaleesa's independence
episodes.title: The Cash Isn't Always Greener

episodes.synopsis: Whitley gets overly enthusiastic when bidding on art at an auction she attends for her internship. Freddie invents a new persona for her radio show.
episodes.title: How Great Thou Art

episodes.synopsis: When Walter arranges a telethon to raise extra money for the outreach center, the Hillman gang contributes by showcasing their various talents.
episodes.title: It's Showtime at Hillman

episodes.synopsis: Whitley's being extremely tough on her sorority's new pledges, and Kim doesn't like it. Ron tries to teach fraternity pledge Terrence about humility.
episodes.title: Sister to Sister, Sister

episodes.synopsis: Whitley organizes a Hillman student art exhibit but is put in a tough position when the gallery owner refuses to display a certain artist's work.
episodes.title: Monet Is the Root of All Evil

episodes.synopsis: Josie uses a speech class assignment to reveal that she's HIV positive. Whitley thinks about taking a big step in her relationship with Dwayne.
episodes.title: If I Should Die Before I Wake

episodes.synopsis: Ron won't be able to join the others at graduation unless he fulfills the history requirement. Walter lands a job and announces he's leaving Hillman.
episodes.title: Never Can Say Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: Whitley and Dwayne face the prospect of a summer apart when Whitley gets a job offer in New York. Ron has a plan to make his dad believe he graduated.
episodes.title: To Be Continued

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne starts teaching classes as Whitley becomes the director of a new dorm, encountering her first problem with a freshman seeking a place to stay.
episodes.title: We've Only Just Begun

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne's high standards for his class lead to a student walk-out; Jaleesa starts a temp agency, and her first assignment is to find a job for Freddie.
episodes.title: The Dwayne Mutiny

episodes.synopsis: Whitley tries to assign her dorm duties to Kim, the resident assistant; Lena faces trouble with the dean when she starts a fire in the dorm.
episodes.title: Home Is Where the Fire Is

episodes.synopsis: Whitley recommends Jaleesa's temp agency to E.H. Wright, but problems ensue when Freddy is hired and disagrees with her boss on affirmative action.
episodes.title: Almost Working Girl

episodes.synopsis: The Pit becomes a refuge when a hurricane approaches Hillman; Ron tries to convince Freddie to play a demo tape of his band on her radio show.
episodes.title: In the Eye of the Storm

episodes.synopsis: Whitley discovers Lena has a crush on Dwayne when he agrees to tutor her in calculus. Realizing Lena is homesick, Whitley agrees to be her confidant.
episodes.title: Rule Number One

episodes.synopsis: Ron's band hires Kim to be their vocalist, hoping to bring a new sound to the group; Colonel Taylor takes up dancing to impress Jaleesa.
episodes.title: Baby, I'm a Star

episodes.synopsis: Whitley's aunt offers her a job as an art buyer, but first Whitley must entertain her cousin Liza on a weekend visit to Hillman.
episodes.title: Liza Who-Little

episodes.synopsis: Whitley is nervous about the engagement party and takes it out on Dwayne, who uses the opportunity to explore other options.
episodes.title: To Tell the Truth

episodes.synopsis: Whitley is still reeling after she learns that Dwayne went on a date; Adele and Marion instantly clash, inflaming tensions between Dwayne and Whitley.
episodes.title: Do You Take This Woman?

episodes.synopsis: Whitley organizes an art exhibit for the dorm dedication ceremony, but Kim has objections to images that Whitley wants to include.
episodes.title: Mammy Dearest

episodes.synopsis: When Dwayne's holiday ski trip falls apart, Col. Taylor invites him over for Christmas dinner, not realizing that Jaleesa has invited Whitley.
episodes.title: Twelve Steps of Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne grows tired of covering Ron's bills and throws him out, prompting Ron to enter a band competition; Freddie becomes more obsessed with Shazza.
episodes.title: Just Another Four-Letter Word

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne is jealous of Whitley's new boyfriend, so Ron takes him to the big game between Hillman and Virginia A&M to takes his mind off his troubles.
episodes.title: The Cat's in the Cradle

episodes.synopsis: Freddie's prison pen pal, Jamal, is released and needs a job, so Ron turns over his duties as a janitor, where Jamal meets Whitley and asks her out.
episodes.title: Prisoner of Love

episodes.synopsis: Whitley faces a decision when she experiences harassment by one of her superiors at work; Terrence decides to major in dance.
episodes.title: Bedroom at the Top

episodes.synopsis: When Whitley solicits donations from business owners for a fundraiser, she meets Byron Douglas III, who asks her to join his state senate campaign.
episodes.title: May the Best Man Win

episodes.synopsis: Whitley is upset that Dwayne is not jealous of her relationship with Byron, so when Kim suggests that Whitley speak with Dwayne, she invites him over.
episodes.title: Kiss You Back

episodes.synopsis: Whitley explains to Byron that she is not in love with Dwayne, and they agree to begin dating; Ron vows to show Kim that he is no longer a ladies man.
episodes.title: Conflict of Interest

episodes.synopsis: Ron gets fired from his new job at a car dealership, but a new business partnership develops; Kim worries that she will not get into medical school.
episodes.title: Sellmates

episodes.synopsis: Lena struggles to keep her grades up and maintain her scholarship; Whitley tries to understand Byron's campaign issues so she can help him win.
episodes.title: Do the Write Thing

episodes.synopsis: Ron is hired to promote Dion's concert. Freddie worries that Gina's in an abusive relationship with her new rapper boyfriend.
episodes.title: Love Taps

episodes.synopsis: Byron's political campaign puts him and Whitley under scrutiny; Jaleesa goes into labor and cannot get in touch with her husband.
episodes.title: Special Delivery

episodes.synopsis: As Whitley prepares for her wedding to Byron, she frets about the details, and then about her choice of groom; sparks fly between Ron and Kim.
episodes.title: Save the Best for Last: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: On her wedding day, Whitley's distracted mind is on Dwayne, who has decided he cannot bring himself to attend the ceremony -- until the last minute.
episodes.title: Save the Best for Last: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Back at school after their Los Angeles honeymoon -- which was interrupted by violent riots -- Whitley and Dwayne stir up campus politics.
episodes.title: Honeymoon in L.A., Part I

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne and Whitley continue to recount their chaotic honeymoon in Los Angeles during the riots, and how the experience changed their lives.
episodes.title: Honeymoon in L.A., Part II

episodes.synopsis: Now living together for the first time, newlyweds Whitley and Dwayne clash over whose belongings they will use to furnish their new apartment.
episodes.title: Interior Desecration Or Sofa So Good

episodes.synopsis: Someone attaches an offensive sign to Charmaine's back, so she takes the presumed culprit to campus court with Freddie and Dorian as "lawyers."
episodes.title: Somebody Say Ho!

episodes.synopsis: Kimberly gets help from her new lab partner, Spencer, when she gets sick in anatomy class, and Dwayne pines for Whitley when she travels out of town.
episodes.title: Really Gross Anatomy

episodes.synopsis: Expecting a pay raise any day, Whitley and Dwayne spend thousands of dollars on a painting, which is promptly stolen -- just as Whitley loses her job.
episodes.title: Don’t Count Your Chickens Before They're Axed

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne has an odd dream in which Whitley, Charmaine and Lena are presidential candidates who resemble -- a bit too eerily -- real-life politicians.
episodes.title: The Little Mister

episodes.synopsis: Whitley calls a TV talk show looking for advice on rekindling her romance with Dwayne, and soon everyone knows about their love troubles.
episodes.title: Baby, It’s Cold Outside

episodes.synopsis: When her mother comes for a Thanksgiving visit, Whitley tries to conceal the fact that she's unemployed -- but her mom has a secret of her own.
episodes.title: Faith Hope and Charity, Part I

episodes.synopsis: The holiday becomes a circus when Dwayne's mother and Whitley's mother clash over Thanksgiving dinner ... and wind up in jail.
episodes.title: Faith Hope and Charity, Part II

episodes.synopsis: As part of a program at Hillman, Dwayne works to show two juvenile offenders that they can rise above a life of violence in the streets.
episodes.title: Original Teacher

episodes.synopsis: Whitley buys a business outfit she can't afford with the intention of returning it -- but when it gets stained, she must consider other options.
episodes.title: Occupational Hazards

episodes.synopsis: Freddie's white, hippie-dippy mother visits for Christmas, and her New Age ways inadvertently stir up trouble between Freddie, Shazade and Ron.
episodes.title: White Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Whitley struggles in her new job as an elementary school teacher, and Lena is frustrated when she discovers that Dorian is celibate.
episodes.title: To Whit, with Love

episodes.synopsis: When Dwayne discovers that Whitley knows all about the surprise birthday party he's planning for her, he decides to pull a fast one.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday to Moi

episodes.synopsis: Ron and Mr. Gaines agree to manage a music club together, but they soon clash over the style of music to feature -- hot dance numbers, or cool blues?
episodes.title: Mind Your Own Business

episodes.synopsis: Dwayne lands an important interview for a prestigious summer job in Japan -- but the interviewer happens to be one of his ex-girlfriends.
episodes.title: Lean On Me

episodes.synopsis: Ron agrees to let Freddie hold a dance marathon at his club to raise funds for charity, but Ron has ulterior motives in mind.
episodes.title: Dancing Machines

episodes.synopsis: Whitley and Dwayne plan a weekend getaway to a remote cabin, but things don't go exactly as planned when Mr. and Mrs. Gaines join them.
episodes.title: Cabin in the Sky

episodes.synopsis: After a confrontation with a street gang, Terrell starts carrying a gun for protection -- but he faces expulsion when the school discovers it.
episodes.title: Great X-pectations

episodes.synopsis: Lena's old boyfriend and some other pals from her Baltimore neighborhood come for a visit but find they don't fit in so well with Lena's new life.
episodes.title: Homie, Don’t Ya Know Me?

episodes.synopsis: The entire campus is giddy with elaborate preparations for a visit from singing legend Lena Horne, who surprises them all with an unexpected request.
episodes.title: A Rock, a River, a Lena

episodes.synopsis: When the gang encourages a former pro baseball star to enroll at Hillman, he returns the favor by helping Gina deal with a troublesome old flame.
episodes.title: College Kid

episodes.synopsis: Whitley realizes that she is pregnant but is reluctant to tell Dwayne, and Kimberly at long last agrees to marry Spencer.
episodes.title: When One Door Closes ..., Part I

episodes.synopsis: With a baby on the way, Dwayne and Whitley make plans to move to Japan for Dwayne's new job -- much to the chagrin of both grandmothers-to-be.
episodes.title: When One Door Closes ..., Part II
